title: Phil Mickelson Apologizes for Comments on Saudi-backed Golf League as KPMG Ends His Sponsorship
sub_head: The six-time major winner said comments released last week were ‘out of context’ but invited sponsors to “pause or end” their relationships with him.
body:
Golf legend Phil Mickelson apologized Tuesday for comments he made regarding a new Saudi-backed Super Golf League, as sponsor KPMG LLP ended its longtime partnership with him.
The apology came after author Alan Shipnuck released comments Mickelson made to him last November regarding the launch of the new league, which is backed by Saudi Arabia’s sovereign-wealth fund. Shipnuck is writing a book about Mickelson.
